manageThemesModal.emptyTitle: You don't have any themes yet

rawValues.title: Resolved values, no variables or styles

onChange.title: Update on change
onChange.description: Applies tokens whenever you make a change (slow!)

remoteJSONBin.title: Update remote
remoteJSONBin.description: Updates JSONBin whenever you make a change

swapStyles.title: Swap styles
swapStyles.description: Swap themes by just changing styles, requires Themes

shouldUpdateStyles.title: Update Figma Styles on apply
shouldUpdateStyles.description: Updates local Figma Styles when themes change or whenever applied

sets.title: Sets
sets.description: Sets allow you to split your tokens up into multiple files. You can activate different sets to control theming.
sets.sourceDescription: Source: This set acts as a source for other sets
sets.activeDescription: Active: This set is included in styles and tokens
sets.inactiveDescription: Inactive: Activate to include for styles or tokens
sets.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this set?

errors.emptyGroupName: The group name cannot be empty, please enter at least one character.
errors.overlappingToken: A token already exists with the same name in the token set “{{tokenSet}}”. Please choose a unique group name, or change these individual token names and try again:
errors.overlappingGroup: We can’t apply the group name “{{groupName}}” as there are tokens with the same name in the “{{tokenSet}}” token set. Please choose a different group name, or change these individual token names and try again:

renameGroupModal.infoSameType: Renaming only affects tokens of the same type

errors.noSetSelected: Please select at least one set.
errors.emptyGroupName: The group name cannot be empty, please enter at least one character.
errors.existingGroup: Please change the name to something different from the original group.
errors.uniqueToken: A token already exists with the same name in the {{tokenSets}} token set(s). Please choose a unique group name, or rename this token:
errors.overlappingGroup: We can’t apply the group name “{{groupName}}” as there are tokens with the same name in the {{tokenSets}} token set(s). Please choose a different group name, or change these individual token names and try again:
errors.overlappingToken: A token already exists with the same name in the token set(s) {{tokenSets}}. Please choose a different group name, or change these individual token names and try again:

resolveDuplicateTokensModal.title: Resolve Duplicate Tokens
resolveDuplicateTokensModal.description: Duplicate tokens (with the same token name) were found, please choose which token to keep. There should only be one token resolved for each token name.

duplicateGroupError: There's an existing token or group with that name
